name: Another FNAF Fan-Game: Open Source
description:
Another FNAF Fangame Open Source (or aff_os for short) is a fan remake of FNAF 2. It works the same but the camera lay-out is different. This was posted on Gamejolt on June 2, 2020 but for some reason it got deleted. So I found a copy and now I'm publishing it here for you to play! Enjoy

The Fan game was created by Phisnom (Phil Morg)

https://www.youtube.com/c/Phisnom

Credit to this guy for finding the copy: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC0t5Twohkpk09wSYCpNhadg
